question: Evaluate the benefits of engaging in an epidemiological study.

sample_answer.full_answer: Engaging in an epidemiological study can have a number of benefits for both the individual and for society (1 mark). For the individual, it can provide an opportunity to learn more about their health and to receive a health check-up (2 marks). For society, it can provide valuable information that can be used to improve public health and to prevent and control diseases (2 marks).

marking_criteria.criteria: States that there are benefits for both the individual and for society.
Describes the benefits for the individual.
